warscrolls.name: Bleeding Icon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Invocation, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne

abilities.name: Sigil of Doom
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** unit wholly within 8" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target. Then, pick a **BLOOD TITHE** ability that you have not unlocked this battle.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the the **blood tithe points** cost of the chosen ability, until the start of your next turn, the target can use the chosen ability as if it had been unlocked.

warscrolls.name: Blood Warriors
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: No Respite
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective you do not control, it has **WARD (5+).**

warscrolls.name: Bloodcrushers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Crushing Onslaught
abilities.effect:
If the unmodified charge roll for this unit is 8+:

• For the rest of the phase, this unit can pass through models in enemy units.
• Enemy **CAVALRY** units passed through by this unit in this phase cannot make pile-in moves for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Bloodletters
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Ceaseless Violence
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, it can move 3". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and must end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: The Blood Must Flow
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Bloodletters** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by this unit and that friendly **Bloodletters** unit.

warscrolls.name: Bloodreavers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Blood For The Blood God!
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's melee weapons if it charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Bloodsecrator
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Rage of Khorne
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of friendly **BLOODBOUND** units' melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Icon of the Blood God
abilities.effect: If a friendly **BLOODBOUND** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

warscrolls.name: Bloodstoker
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Whipped To Fury
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO BLOODBOUND** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Great Axe of Khorne** is 3.

abilities.name: Shattering Charge
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target is **INFANTRY**, inflict an additional 3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Outrageous Carnage
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made by this unit scores a critical hit, inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit within 8" of it after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved (and continue the attack sequence).

warscrolls.name: Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Mighty Axe of Khorne** is 4 .

abilities.name: Ensnaring Lash
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
If the target is in combat with this unit when the target is picked to use a **FIGHT** ability:

• It must pick this unit to be the target of the pile-in move (Core Rules, 15.3).
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made as part of that **FIGHT** ability against this unit.

abilities.name: Beckon The Hunt
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON** unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, when making charge rolls for the target, roll 1 additional dice, to a maximum of 3, and discard 1 dice of your choice.

warscrolls.name: Claws of Karanak
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: The Scent of Blood
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Pack Hunters
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **FLESH HOUNDS** unit or a friendly **Karanak,** this unit's combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

warscrolls.name: Deathbringer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Killer of Kings
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit and **MANIFESTATION** in combat with this unit to be a target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6 for each target. If the roll exceeds the target's Health characteristic, 1 model from that unit is slain or, if the target is a **MANIFESTATION,** it is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Trophies of Glorious Deaths
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 8" of this unit
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On an 5+, that command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use it are still lost. This reaction cannot be used more than once per command.

warscrolls.name: Flesh Hounds
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Champion (1/5), Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Hunters of Mystics
abilities.effect:
If the casting roll for an enemy **WIZARD** within 12" of this unit contains 2 or more results of 1 or 2, the spell is miscast.

If the chanting roll for an enemy **PRIEST** within 12" of this unit is an unmodified 2, the prayer fails and its effect is not resolved. In addition, your opponent cannot give that **PRIEST** any ritual points for the rest of the phase.

warscrolls.name: Garrek's Reavers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Blood for the Blood God!
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Grisly Trophies
abilities.effect: If this unit is in a **Blades of Khorne** army and any enemy models were slain this turn by this unit’s attacks, you gain 1 **blood tithe point**.

warscrolls.name: Gorechosen of Dromm
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Dromm, Wounder of Worlds
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Dromm**, **Wounder of Worlds**, is on the battlefield, it has **PRIEST (1)** and can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Priest (1), Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Blood Marked
abilities.effect: This unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage inflicted by **SPELL** abilities and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS.**

abilities.name: Offering of Blood
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Allocate 3 damage points to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). For the rest of the turn, add 1 to this unit's power level, to a maximum of 2.

warscrolls.name: Hexgorger Skulls
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Invocation, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne

abilities.name: Hexgorgers
abilities.effect: For each part of this **MANIFESTATION** that is within 8" of a **WIZARD** (friendly or enemy), subtract 1 from casting rolls for that **WIZARD**.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

Each time this **MANIFESTATION** moves, both its parts must end within 8" of each other. Each part of this **MANIFESTATION** is armed with a **Stream of Molten Blood**.

warscrolls.name: Kamandora’s Blades
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Khornate Hound
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Kannat** is a token. Each time you declare a **FIGHT** ability for this unit while its **Kannat** is on the battlefield, as a reaction, you can remove its **Kannat** from the battlefield and then add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Bloodied Weapons** for the rest of the phase.

abilities.name: Gather the Skulls!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain and you earn 1 blood tithe point.

warscrolls.name: Karanak
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Beast, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Stalk The Prey
abilities.declare: If this unit’s quarry is on the battlefield, pick this unit and up to 1 friendly **Flesh Hounds** unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove the targets from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield more than 6" from this unit’s quarry and more than 9" from all other enemy units. If picked to be a target, the unit of **Flesh Hounds** must also be set up wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: First of the Pack
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **Flesh Hounds** unit, add 2 to charge rolls for this unit. In addition, while any friendly **Flesh Hounds** units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can ignore the effect of the ‘Beast’ ability.

abilities.name: Prey of the Blood God
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: Pick an enemy **HERO** to be this unit's quarry. You can pick a **HERO** in reserve.

warscrolls.name: Khorgorath
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Feast Upon Their Bones
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy non-**MONSTER** units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Horrific Predators
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Khorne on Juggernaut
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Lord of the Brass Stampede
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Magore's Fiends
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: No Respite
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll 2 dice. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Mighty Lord of Khorne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: 'Bring Me Their Skull!'
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly **BLOODBOUND INFANTRY HERO** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Lord of the Bloodbound
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for friendly **BLOODBOUND INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Mighty Skullcrushers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Realmgore Ritualist
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Desecrating Blood Runes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an objective or terrain feature within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, add I to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **BLOODBOUND** units while they are wholly within 12" of the target.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Bloodcrushers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/3), Musician (1/3), Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Brass Stampede
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through models in the target unit and must end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Mighty Lord of Khorne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Howl of Blood-Curdling Savagery
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick a visible friendly **BLOODBOUND** unit that is wholly within 12" of this unit and not in combat to be the target. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. That unit can move through the combat ranges of any enemy units and must end that move within 1⁄2" of a visible enemy unit. If it does so, the target has charged.

abilities.name: Reality-Splitting Axe
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability even if it has been destroyed. Pick an enemy **HERO** that was allocated any damage points by this unit’s **Axe of Khorne** this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, the target is automatically destroyed and cannot be replaced for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Scyla Anfingrimm
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Beast, Hero, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Bestial Leap
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6" as if it had **FLY** but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Brass Collar of Khorne
abilities.effect: This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Skarbrand
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Inescapable Wrath
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Roar of Total Rage
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll either 3 dice or a number of dice equal to the number of damage points this unit has. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Skarbrand's Rage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, or if it did not use a **FIGHT** ability last turn, the effects of the 'Blood-drenched' ability apply to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Skarr Bloodwrath
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Murderous Paragon
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **Wrathmongers** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: The Slaughterborn
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. On an 8+, set up a replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Skull Altar
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Chaos, Blades of Khorne

abilities.name: Ascend The Altar
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have an **Invoker,** pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE INFANTRY PRIEST** within 3" of it and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now an **Invoker** (see 'Words of Hate').

abilities.name: Descend The Altar
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has an **Invoker** that was not placed on it this turn, set up the **Invoker** on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer an **Invoker.**

abilities.name: Hatred of Sorcery
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has an **Invoker,** pick up to D3 enemy **ENDLESS SPELLS** within 18" of this terrain feature to be the targets(s) and make a **banishment roll** of 2D6 for each target.
abilities.effect: Resolve the effect of the 'Banish Manifestation' ability for each target. If any **ENDLESS SPELLS** are banished by this ability, you gain 1 **blood tithe** point.

abilities.name: Words of Hate
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has an **Invoker:**

• Add 1 to chanting rolls for the **Invoker.**
• The **Invoker** cannot use **MOVE** abilities.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to the **Invoker,** measure to this terrain feature instead.
• All attacks that would target the **Invoker** target this terrain feature instead.
• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the **Invoker.** Then, set up the **Invoker** on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer an **Invoker.** If it is not possible to set up the **Invoker,** it is slain.

warscrolls.name: Skull Cannon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Gruesome Bombardment
abilities.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by a **SHOOT** ability used by this unit, subtract 3 from that enemy unit’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Grind Their Bones, Seize Their Skulls
abilities.effect: If any enemy models are slain by a **FIGHT** ability used by this unit, after that **FIGHT** ability has been resolved, this unit can immediately use a **SHOOT** ability as if it were your shooting phase.

warscrolls.name: Skullgrinder
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Bone-crushing Strikes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than the target’s Control characteristic, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Tempered By Fury
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly **BLOODBOUND HERO** within 8" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target's melee weapons. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Herald of Trampling Death
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Bloodcrushers** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, weapons used by this unit and the target have **Charge (+1 Damage)**.

warscrolls.name: Skullreapers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Trial of Skulls
abilities.effect: Add 8 to this unit's control score while it is in combat.

warscrolls.name: Skulltaker
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

abilities.name: The Eternal Duel
abilities.effect: If an enemy **HERO** had any damage points allocated to it by this unit's combat attacks this turn and that **HERO** was destroyed this turn, **Heal (X)** this unit, where **X** is the number of damage points this unit has.

abilities.name: Drawn By Blood
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Enemy Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** unit that used a **FIGHT** ability this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield in combat with the target and not in combat with any other enemy units.

abilities.name: Heroes' Bane
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, while the target is in combat with this unit, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** but all of its combat attacks must target that enemy **HERO.**

warscrolls.name: Slaughterpriest
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Blood Sacrifice
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a unit (friendly or enemy) within this unit's combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:
• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• This unit gains 1 ritual point.

abilities.name: Scorn of Sorcery
abilities.effect: This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Valkia The Bloody
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Borne On Wings Of Blood
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **soaring above the battlefield**. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: The Red Angel of Slaughter
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **soaring above the battlefield**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, pick a visible enemy unit within 10" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: The Gaze of Khorne
abilities.effect: If a friendly **BLOODBOUND** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6. However, friendly **BLOODBOUND** units cannot use **RETREAT** abilities while they are within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Daemon

melee.name: Mighty Axe of Khorne and Bloodflail

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Mighty Axe of Khorne and Bloodflail** is 4.

abilities.name: Vengeance of Khorne
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 8 dice. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Commander Of Tyrants
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick another visible friendly non-**UNIQUE BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON** unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wrathful Dominance
abilities.effect: Add I to hit rolls for this unit's attacks that target an enemy **HERO.**

warscrolls.name: Wrath-Axe
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Invocation, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Blades of Khorne

abilities.name: Hatred's Edge
abilities.declare: If this **MANIFESTATION** charged this turn, pick an enemy unit with a starting size greater than 1 that is in combat with this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. On an 8+, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Wrathmongers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Bloodbound

abilities.name: Bloodfury
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy model within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Both players roll off. If you win the roll-off, pick a melee weapon that the target is armed with. Your opponent must pick a visible unit in their army within 3" of the target (they can pick the target's own unit, and even if it is a single-model unit).

Your opponent must resolve combat attacks for the target using the melee weapon you picked against the unit they picked.

abilities.name: Crimson Haze
abilities.effect: While this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **BLOODBOUND** units, excluding **Wrathmongers** units, while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

rules.name: Butchers of Nations
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON unit
rules.effect: Pick a friendly **BLOODBOUND** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of the unit using this ability to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

rules.name: Drawn to Carnage
rules.effect: Add **X** to charge rolls for friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units, where **X** is the number of friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE CAVALRY** or **MONSTER** units that have already charged this phase and that are wholly within 12" of the unit being rolled for.

rules.name: Bloody Competitors
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO BLOODBOUND** unit and a friendly non-**HERO BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON** unit to be the targets.
rules.effect: Until the start of your next turn, while the targets are wholly within 12" of each other, add 1 to wound rolls for the targets’ combat attacks.

rules.name: Tide of Savagery
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **BLOODBOUND HERO** and up to 2 other friendly **BLOODBOUND** units that are wholly within 12" of that **HERO** to be the targets.
rules.effect: Add 2" to the targets’ Move characteristic for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Eager Killers
rules.effect: Each friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON** unit that has used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is not in combat can move D6". It cannot end that move in combat.

rules.name: Tireless Conquerors
rules.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **BLOODBOUND** units that target an enemy unit that is contesting an objective you do not control.

spells.name: Blood Boil
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target's attacks until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Final Act of Violence
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time a model in the target unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll 2 dice instead. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

spells.name: Uncontrollable Rage
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the effects of the 'Blood-drenched' ability (see 'Blades of Khorne Battle Traits') apply to the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, ignore the effect of'Wild-eyed Brutality' on the target.

spells.name: Runes of Loathing
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target has **WARD (3+)** against damage inflicted by **SPELL** abilities, **PRAYER** abilities and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS** (including **FIGHT** abilities). If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

spells.name: Goreflesh
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, ignore the first damage point allocated to the target in each phase. If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

spells.name: Gift of Apoplexy
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target uses an ability that is not a **MOVE, CHARGE** or **FIGHT** ability, after that ability is resolved, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, inflict 3 mortal damage instead of D3.

spells.name: Summon Bleeding Icon
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bleeding Icon** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Bleeding Icon** wholly within 18" of the chanter and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Hexgorger Skulls
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Hexgorger Skulls** invocation on the battlefield, pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Hexgorger Skulls** invocation wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A **Hexgorger Skulls** invocation has 2 parts that must be set up within 8" of each other.

spells.name: Summon Wrath-axe
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Wrath-axe** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Wrath-axe** wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Crown of the Slaughterborn
artefacts.effect: Enemy units within 12" of this unit cannot be healed and cannot have slain models returned to them.

artefacts.name: Warmonger's Icon
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick this unit and up to D3 friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS** units within this unit's combat range to be the targets.
artefacts.effect: The targets have **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: The Scarring Blade
artefacts.effect:
Allocate D3 damage points to this unit (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). For the rest of the turn, add **X** to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS** units for the rest of the turn, where **X** is equal to the number of damage points allocated to this unit this turn by this ability.

For the rest of the battle, this unit cannot use the ‘Hate-fuelled Killers’ ability and cannot be healed.

artefacts.name: Bloodmist Skull
artefacts.effect: This unit has **WARD (3+)** against damage inflicted by shooting attacks.

artefacts.name: Ar'gath, The King of Blades
artefacts.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for enemy **HEROES** while they are in combat with this unit.

artefacts.name: Collar of Contempt
artefacts.effect: This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1).** Each time this unit successfully unbinds a spell, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.

artefacts.name: Butcher's Blade
artefacts.declare: Pick each enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit's combat attacks to be the targets.
artefacts.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

heroicTraits.name: Unrivalled Battlelust
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of friendly **BALEFUL LORDS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Crowned in Butchery
heroicTraits.effect: Add 20 to this unit's control score while it is in combat.

heroicTraits.name: Magical Scorn
heroicTraits.effect:
Subtract 1 from casting rolls for **WIZARDS** while they are within 12" of this unit.

Subtract 1 from chanting rolls for enemy **PRIESTS** while they are within 12" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Frenzied Taskmaster
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit within this unit's combat range that is not in combat to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: The target can move D6" but cannot end that move in combat. If the target ends that move within this unit's combat range, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

heroicTraits.name: Skull Collector
heroicTraits.effect:
If any damage points were allocated to an enemy **HERO** by this unit's combat attacks this turn and that enemy **HERO** has been destroyed, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for the rest of the battle.

This unit can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

other.name: Hatred For All
other.declare: You must use this ability if this unit is not in combat and there are any other visible friendly units within this unit's combat range. You must pick 1 of those friendly units to be the target.
other.effect: Resolve combat attacks for this unit against the target.

other.name: Frenzied Violence
other.declare: Pick the **Slaughterpriest** in this Regiment of Renown to chant this prayer, pick a visible unit in this Regiment of Renown wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
other.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target unit has **WARD (5+)** while every model in that unit is wholly within the combat range of an enemy unit. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

other.name: Glimpse The God
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
other.declare: Pick each unit in this Regiment of Renown that used a **FIGHT** ability this turn to be a target.
other.effect: If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by the target's combat attacks this turn, that enemy unit was destroyed this turn, and no damage points were allocated to that enemy unit this turn by combat attacks made by a friendly unit that is not in this Regiment of Renown, for the rest of the battle, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's **Blood-hungry** weapons.

battleTraits.name: Blood-drenched
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Skulls for the Skull Throne’ ability
battleTraits.effect:
After that ability has been resolved, if you unlocked a Blood Tithe ability this turn, pick a friendly Blades of Khorne unit to be the target. The following effects apply to the target for the rest of the battle:
***Wild-eyed Brutality:*** Ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target.
***Blood Haze:*** If the target is **BLOODBOUND**, its **Blood-hungry** weapons have **Crit (Mortal)**.
***Weapons of Murder:***  If the target is a non-**MONSTER DAEMON** unit, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of its **Blood-hungry** weapons, including **Blood-hungry Companion** weapons.
***Bloodlords Supreme:*** If the target is a **MONSTER**, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of its **Blood-hungry** weapons.

battleTraits.name: Blood for the Blood God
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Earn 1 blood tithe point each time a unit (friendly or enemy) is destroyed. Blood tithe points are spent to unlock **BLOOD TITHE** abilities. You can only use **BLOOD TITHE** abilities that are unlocked. Once a **BLOOD TITHE** ability is unlocked, you do not need to spend further blood tithe points to use it.

battleTraits.name: Skulls for the Skull Throne
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Start of Any Turn
battleTraits.effect: Pick a **BLOOD TITHE** ability that you have not unlocked and spend the number of blood tithe points required to unlock that ability (shown in the top-right corner of the ability). That **BLOOD TITHE** ability is now unlocked for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Murderlust
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. You can replace one of the dice in the charge roll with that value. If you do so, inflict D3 mortal damage on the unit using that **CHARGE** ability after that ability is resolved.

battleTraits.name: Divine Scorn
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once per Turn, Start of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy **WIZARDS** or **PRIESTS** within 6" of any friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units to be the target(s).
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the target's power level, to a minimum of 0, until the start of the next turn.

battleTraits.name: Punish the Pacifist
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Each unit (friendly and enemy) and enemy **MANIFESTATION** that is not in combat is a target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 1-2, inflict 1 mortal damage on each target. On a 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on each enemy target.

battleTraits.name: Murder the Mystic
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 4 enemy **MANIFESTATIONS** to be the target(s).
battleTraits.effect: Make a **banishment roll** of 2D6 for each target. If the banishment roll equals or exceeds the banishment value listed on that **MANIFESTATION**'s warscroll, inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit within 3" of it and then it is **banished** and removed from play.

battleTraits.name: Glorious Combat or Naught
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units.

battleTraits.name: Revel in Battle
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for combat attacks made by enemy units that charged this turn and that target a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** unit have no effect.

battleTraits.name: Slaughter Triumphant
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units that charged in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Cleave Wide the Grin of Khorne
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units.

battleTraits.name: Born of Butchery
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **BALEFUL LORDS** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the current battle round number plus the number of units (friendly and enemy) that have been destroyed this battle. If the roll contains 8 or more results of 3+, set up a replacement unit identical to the target on the battlefield, more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Bellow of Hatred
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **BALEFUL LORDS** unit that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with the target. The target cannot use **RAMPAGE** abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Mage-Eaters
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
battleTraits.effect: Make a magic-eater roll of D6. On a 3+, that spell is unbound. If the spell was unbound and the magic-eater roll was 5+, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.

battleTraits.name: First In His Sight
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Enemy Turn
battleTraits.effect: **Heal (D3)** each friendly **BALEFUL LORDS HERO** that is in combat.

battleTraits.name: Drawn By Blood
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **BALEFUL LORDS** unit that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect:
That unit can move D6". It can end that move in combat but only with units it was in combat with at the start of the phase.

If that unit destroyed any enemy units this turn, then instead:

That unit can move 2D6". It can end that move in combat with any units that had any damage points allocated to them this turn.

battleTraits.name: The Price of Mercy
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability. Pick each friendly **BALEFUL LORDS** unit that did not charge or use a **FIGHT** ability this turn to be a target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

battleTraits.name: Sunder the Sorcerous
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick each enemy **MANIFESTATION** within 3" of a friendly **BALEFUL LORDS** unit to be a target.
battleTraits.effect:
Roll 2D6 for each target. If the roll equals or exceeds the banishment value of the target:
• That target is banished and removed from play.
• Inflict D3 mortal damage on the enemy unit that summoned the target.

battleTraits.name: Murder-won Trophies
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Deployment Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS HERO** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Give the target 1 artefact of power from the 'Gorechosen Champions' Army of Renown rules.

**Designer's Note:** *This artefact of power is given to the **HERO** during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*

battleTraits.name: Brutal Lashmaster
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **Bloodstoker** uses the 'Whipped to Fury' ability, another friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS HERO** within its combat range can be picked to be the target of that ability instead of a non-**HERO BLOODBOUND** unit.

battleTraits.name: Legendary Slayers
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: **Blood-hungry** weapons used by friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS** units have **Crit (Mortal)**.

battleTraits.name: The Red God's Eye
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: Friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS** units have **WARD (6+)**.

battleTraits.name: Hate-fuelled Killers
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.effect: The first time each friendly **GORECHOSEN CHAMPIONS** unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 5+, that unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** that unit.
